explanation: [0-0] A man dressed as Mario and a man wearing glasses dressed as Luigi are standing in front of a rectangular black table. On the table are three rolls of toilet paper, two yellow lines and one red line. On the left side of the table are a Bowser head, a white ghost, a gold coin and a mushroom. They are about to play a game using toilet paper rolls. In the upper left corner of the screen is Mario's head and the white number 5, and in the upper right corner is Luigi's head and the white number 5. The background is a white wall and a closed white door, and the floor is yellowish-brown.

[0-6] Mario picks up a roll of toilet paper from the table and rolls it on the table. The toilet paper roll stops at the position of the gold coin, and a yellow gold coin and a white "+1" appear on the screen. His score increases by 1 point to 6 points. Luigi cheers him on from the sidelines.
